# Data Visualizations

::: callout
## Learning Objectives
+ Map rows and columns of rectangular data to elements of a graphic
+ Describe and/or draw a desired plot based to answer a research question
+ Describe charts using the grammar of graphics
+ Create layered graphics that highlight multiple aspects of the data
+ Evaluate existing charts and develop new versions that improve accessibility and readability
+ Identify the appropriate kind of plot (geometries and aesthetics) given types of variables.
:::
